## Florida College Football Teams

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(plotly)
data <- read.csv("./Florida_CFB.csv")
plot_ly(data, x = data$Year, y = data$Wins, color = data$Team, type = 'scatter', mode = 'lines')
```
